name: Shooting goats
description:
Project name: Shooting goats

Name: Jingru Hu 

Project Idea:  I wanted to make a shooter game with small missions.  It was too simple to just do a collection game, so I added a shooting function.

How to play:   Go into the forest, collect five mushrooms, dodge the black goat, left mouse button shoot the goat. Start to start the game, esc to exit.
